text: <!channel> Ill be at the office with a key around 10:30

Hey guys! So here is the preparation plan for Saturday:-

Thursday: (Afternoon) Cut out logo boards using the extra wood.
Friday: Finalise Video and Kahoot Questionnaire
- Get remaining office appliances, prizes for the short games and decorations (start decorating if there is time)

Saturday: Show starts at 1pm! Ends at 11pm!
Loek, Anish and James are floor ambassadors: mingle, chat and inform people about Offcourse (done in shifts)
Natalie- makes sure video and questionnaires are ready

Division of tasks:
Video “ What makes Offcourse Unique?”-James
Kahoot- Anish, Rahul (questions) and Loek (questions)
Logo- All :slightly_smiling_face:
Yep, will do.

<@UBNQTDJ7R> <@UBE37B8JX> There will never be a point that all content will be rendered properly. That's not a fault of the platform, but a result of the way the internet works. This should be addressed by a better design in which this point is communicated clearly. <@U9GR3G88Y> is already working on this, but any help is more than appreciated. Maybe pick it up tomorrow, when you are all in the office?
There are still one or two more that I have to check which I will do when I get back to Rotterdam this afternoon

<@UBE37B8JX> here's the list you asked for:
1. Discover Designer Thinking -  What is Design checkpoint
2. Arduino Basics - Course Material Mode for the ICT Praktikdagen
3. Manage Infrastructure With Terraform - Make A Plan And Apply It checkpoint
4. Learn more about GraphQL is repeated
5. Compose Large Systems With Aws Step Functions - Create A Lambda For Each Task checkpoint
6. Print Your First 3D Model - Master 3D Printing Software Cura
7. Discover Wearables And Technology - Lets start with some definitions checkpoint
8. Learn Vector Graphics - Learn the difference between vector and raster
9. Learn Adobe Photoshop - Get to know the basics checkpoint

<@U0D6EPESC> if we're gonna start putting the beta version on the site and promoting it, then maybe we should also make sure that all the courses available on the site now don't have any faulty material as well. A few cards have links that don't display or don't show a preview.

Roadmap:
- move this version to a beta env (deadline friday...)
- add search to next (give or take two weeks)
- create embedable widget (give or take a week)
- bugfixes etc to beta (two weeks)
- move search to beta stage (a day)
- sleep until March (march)

- way better performance (this one is maybe a not  hidden one, come to think about it)
- documentation, styleguide, component library (important for community and customers/partners)
- completely modular design
- rewritten from scratch
^^ hidden features:

- theming
- improved typography
- way better performance (...added it here as well... ;-)
- mobile
- improved content loading
^^ main new features:
<@UC46W9E77> <@UBE37B8JX> (and <@U8AM0S37E> when she's back) let's start planning the PR around the public beta this wednesday
<!channel> we're close to the public beta release of the second iteration of the platform. Let's slowly start testing it ourselves: <http://next.offcourse.io|next.offcourse.io>.
done
<!channel> can someone tell <@U9GR3G88Y> to call me back? Cannot reach him and it's quite urgent
<!channel> just a reminder that from this Monday onwards, we'll be working out of the new office. See you all there!
<https://impactstartupfest.com/> <@U0ARRNM3R> went to this event last year and thought it was nice. Anyone wants to go this year and represent us? <!channel>

Hey Kelly!
Tomorrow I wasn't supposed to work and I've got an appointment with my GP. But if a few extra hands are needed, I can come a bit later in the day. :)
Needless to say not to wear your best outfit tomorrow as you will get dusty:v:

Thanks <@U8DQWL9EK>! Yes, <@UBM6QM2BX> <@UBNQTDJ7R> <@UBE37B8JX> <@UC46W9E77> if you have planned to work tomorrow and have time to do some physical work at the new office, please come in at 10 at the new office. The address is Schiemond 20-22. Jan Hein will also be there at 10, if you guys do not know where to find the office within the building exactly you can wait for him at the entrance. There will be a handyman indeed to help us not to damage anything important when getting out the carpet and ceiling plates :slightly_smiling_face: So wait for him and his instructions before you get started :wink:

I will see you all on Wednesday and I will schedule an hour with every one of you to talk about your assignments.

PS: This concerns some things I had planned tomorrow with some of you; <@UBM6QM2BX> I heard you finished the cards for Ultimaker already so if there are no other urgent things tomorrow it would be great if you could go and help at the new office. <@UC46W9E77> we can have our meeting on Wednesday instead and you’re welcome to come and help out tomorrow at the new office too.

Hi! I just heard from Kelly that the one's who will be helping with getting the ceiling/ floor etc out we meet at 10:00 at the office tomorrow morning? :slightly_smiling_face: Also a "handyman" will be there to help?! Here's a small planning/ overview what needs to be done/ purchased for the office. Still needs to be updated about when, what, how and who. :slightly_smiling_face:
Hey guys <!channel>! tomorrow we planned to start renovating the new office
This week tuesday and thursday, next week tuesday to thursday
Hey guys! I would like to take a group photo some tine this week or next week. Could you comment which day you would be at the office? :slightly_smiling_face:
At that’s nice, you’re staying in the city center then? See you in an hour :)
Ah okay! I’ll be in just before 10! I’ve got the address on google maps, it’s not too far at all from the hostel I’m at!

<@UC46W9E77> Yes most of us come in at 10, so that would be fine. I will be in the office in 30 minutes, so you’re welcome to come in earlier if you like. Do you have the address? We are situated on the 2nd floor of the building.
Thanks <@U0D6EPESC>! Been really nice to see the city. Did you say that people will be arriving from 10? Shall I arrive at 10?
Welcome <@UC46W9E77> hope you had a great first weekend in Rotterdam. See you in the morning!
<@U8DQWL9EK> have fun on your last day :sleepy: sorry that I cannot be there today, but we'll have a proper party :tada: later!

Was at a conference yesterday and saw a presentation about high impact learning. Philosophy and couple of models that could be useful/interesting for Offcourse:

- The website: <http://www.highimpactlearningthatlasts.com/>
- A conference on the topic: <http://event.toetsen-examineren.nl/>
- Something else, some resources on design thinking for educators I found at IDEO: <https://www.ideo.com/post/design-thinking-for-educators>

:pencil2:

attachments.title: De kracht van video: 3000+ nieuwe donoren voor Sanquin - Emerce
attachments.text: Tomorrowmen won de award voor de Beste videocampagne volgens de jury van de Dutch Search Awards door de toepassing van emotie en nieuwe technieken om de boodschap bij de juiste doelgroep over te brengen. Hierin werd benoemd dat de cross-channel werkwijze, waarin geadverteerd werd op onder andere YouTube, STER, RTL XL, Instagram en Facebook, erg succesvol toegepast is binnen de campagne.
